error.regex: ChunkLoadError|Loading chunk.*failed|Failed to fetch dynamically imported module

verdict.summary: Webpack chunk (code split piece) not found. Deploy replaced files while users had old HTML.

workarounds.action: Add error boundary that triggers window.location.reload() on ChunkLoadError
workarounds.how: class ErrorBoundary extends React.Component { componentDidCatch(e) { if (e.name === 'ChunkLoadError') window.location.reload(); } }

workarounds.action: Use content-addressed filenames (default in Next.js) so old chunks remain available
Keep old build assets for a grace period during deployments

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'ChunkLoadError' is a build_error error while 'Error' has a different failure mode despite similar symptoms. Check error message details to differentiate.
